import React, { useState } from 'react' function PizzaBlock({ title, price, img, sizes, types }) { const [activeType, setActiveType] = useState('') const [activeSize, setActiveSize] = useState('') const typeNames = ['тонкое', 'традиционное'] return (

{title}

    {types.map((type, index) => (
  • {typeNames[type]}
    • ))}
    {sizes.map((size, index) => (
  • {size} см.
    • ))}
от {price} $
) } export default PizzaBlock
